mapper.select: select count(*) as userCount from admin where 1 = 1
select count(*) as meetCount from MeetingInfo where 1 = 1
select count(*) as weeklyCount from weekly_basic where 1 = 1
select count(*) as userCount from admin where manage = 1
select count(*) as userCount from admin where manage = 0
select count(*) as meetingType from MeetingInfo where meeting_type = 1
select count(*) as meetingType from MeetingInfo where meeting_type = 2
select count(*) as meetingType from MeetingInfo where meeting_type = 3
select count(*) as meetingType from MeetingInfo where meeting_type = 4
select count(*) as meetingType from MeetingInfo where meeting_type = 5
select count(*) as meetingType from MeetingInfo where meeting_type = 6
